message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $11,000 is significantly below its true value. I could come down to $13,000, which I feel is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12,200?
